description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Luffy inflates his body like a balloon to deflect attacks or projectiles.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy uses it to deflect Buggy's cannonball back at the Buggy Pirates.

abilityReveals.description: Luffy stretches his arm and swings it in a wide arc to strike enemies.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used during the battle with Buggy in Orange Town.

description: Allows the user to split their body into pieces and control them independently, making them immune to slashing attacks.

users.circumstances: Buggy ate the fruit, which led to his grudge against Shanks

abilityReveals.description: Buggy separates his hand and launches it like a projectile to attack from a distance.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to attack Luffy during their battle in Orange Town.

strengths.description: Buggy's body can split apart, making sword attacks ineffective.
